name: DigiDosimeter
short_description: This project consists of a high energy radiation measurement tool. It can be distinguished from other projects due to its modular nature. Detector and User Interface modules are separate and communicate via a I2C bus. This enables the UI component to be used together with a variety of different types of detectors, as long as these implement the same set of commands for accessing the event counter, dose measurement (if available) or other data the detector might provide. This project readily specifies the hardware and firmware for a user interface module, and a Geiger Muller based detector. The schematics and source code are therefore provided as public domain contributions of the author of this project.
summary: Versatile high energy radiation measurement tool

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Science/Research
